cards.title: Trailblazer
powers: {Trailblazer} deals 1 Target 1 Projectile Damage. You may play a Position.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: There's got to be a better place for this.

cards.title: Vantage Point
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Positions.
You may draw an additional card during your Draw Phase.

flavorQuotes.text: It's a good view. {BR}Shame there isn't time to enjoy it.

cards.title: Defensive Bulwark
cards.powers: Up to 2 Targets other than {Trailblazer} regain 2 HP.
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Positions.
Reduce the first damage dealt to {Trailblazer} each turn by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: We'll be safe {BR}in here for a moment.

cards.title: Striking Zone
cards.powers: {Trailblazer} deals all non-Hero Targets 1 Projectile Damage.
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Positions.
Increase damage dealt by {Trailblazer} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: This is as good of {BR}a battlefield as we're going to get.

cards.title: Climbing Harness
body: Increase the first damage dealt by {Trailblazer} during each of your turns by 1.
If a Position is in play, instead, increase the first damage dealt by {Trailblazer} during each turn by 1.

cards.title: Worn Binoculars
body: You may use an additional Power during your Power Phase.

flavorQuotes.text: They still work, {BR}so I'll still keep 'em.

cards.title: Supply Pack
cards.body: After the first time one of your Positions enters play each turn, use the power on it.

flavorQuotes.text: I set up quick. {BR}Time is a luxury I don't have.

cards.title: Rapid Repositioning
body: The first time an Environment card enters play each turn, you may destroy a Position to play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Sometimes, there's a {BR}better spot if you keep your eyes open.

cards.title: Parting Gift
body: When a Position is destroyed, {Trailblazer} deals up to 2 Targets 1 Fire Damage.
cards.notes: Similarly, can this be triggered by enemy damage? To destroy positions when you'd be hit? When Environment cards are in play?

cards.title: Wasteland Wanderer
powers: {Trailblazer} deals 1 Target 3 Fire Damage, increased by 1 for each card under this card. Destroy this card.
body: After an Environment card is destroyed, you may move it under this card.

cards.title: Lead the Way
body: Search your Deck for a Position and put it in hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

cards.title: Uncharted Grounds
body: Shuffle your Trash into your Deck.
Reveal cards from the top of your Deck until you reveal 2 Positions. Play one of them. Shuffle the rest of the Revealed cards into your Deck.
{Trailblazer} deals up to 2 Targets 1 Fire Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Of course I don't know where {BR}everything is. Finding out is the fun part.

cards.title: Prepared Ambush
body: If there is a Position in play, up to 3 Heroes may use a Power now.
Destroy an Ongoing Card, an Environment Card, and a Position.

cards.title: Tactical Withdrawl
body: Use the Power on one of your Positions twice.
Destroy that Position.

flavorQuotes.text: We're not retreating. {BR}We're repositioning to a superior location. {BR}It just happens to be behind us.

cards.title: Trail of Ashes
body: {Trailblazer} deals each non-Hero Target and themselves 2 Fire Damage.
Destroy an Environment Card. If you do, draw a card.
Destroy a Position. If you do, draw a card.

cards.title: Guided Odyssey
body: Play a card from the Environment Trash.
Play a Position from your Trash.
Up to 2 players play the top card of their deck.

dummyCards.title: Sudden Advance
body: Play up to 2 Positions now.
{Trailblazer} deals each non-Hero Target and themselves 2 Fire Damage.

dummyCards.title: Throw to the Trails
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero Target.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
After that Target suffers damage, place 1 Token on this card.
When this card is destroyed, {Trailblazer} deals that Target Fire Damage equal to the number of Tokens on this card.

tokenPools.name: Throw to the Trails's Token Pool

promoCards.title: Trailblazer
powers: Select a Position. That Position is Indestructible for the rest of this turn. You may play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I'm already here. Let's get started.
